text: La bisarca is a 1950 Italian comedy science fiction film directed by Giorgio Simonelli. It is based on a radio program with the same name. == Cast == * Peppino De Filippo: Toni La Motta * Lída Baarová: Greta * Clelia Matania: Dolores Garcia * Silvana Pampanini: Mirella * Aroldo Tieri: Alberto * Carlo Campanini: Salvador Garcia * Enrico Viarisio: Georges Durand * Kay Medford: Anna Paperiska * Maria Donati: Georges Durand's Wife * Riccardo Billi: Noè * Franco Coop: Otto Krüger * Paul Muller: Complice di Anna Paperiska * Galeazzo Benti: Cliente galante * Tino Buazzelli: Dimitri * Arturo Bragaglia: Mayor * Virgilio Riento: Capo della banda di Arcachon * Vittorio Sanipoli: Johnny * Nietta Zocchi: Cliente di La Motta * Bruno Corelli * Mario Siletti * Giulio Donnini * Franco Pesce ==References== ==External links== * Category:Italian films Category:Films directed by Giorgio Simonelli Category:1950s science fiction comedy films Category:Italian science fiction comedy films Category:Films with screenplays by Ruggero Maccari Category:Films based on radio series
title: La bisarca
